TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl
Public MustInherit Class HierarchicalDataBoundControl Inherits BaseDataBoundControl

summary.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in hierarchical form.

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in hierarchical form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是用於擷取 ASP.NET 階層式資料來源控制項的資料，並將控制項的使用者介面項目顯示該資料繫結的 ASP.NET 控制項的基底類別。The class is the base class used for ASP.NET controls that retrieve data from an ASP.NET hierarchical data source control and bind user-interface elements of the control to that data for display. 和類別衍生自。The and classes derive from . 不使用網頁開發人員類別直接; 相反地，他們會使用衍生自這個類別的控制項。Page developers do not use the class directly; instead, they use controls that derive from this class. 控制項開發人員可以擴充這個類別來建立資料繫結控制項，可搭配類別可實作介面和類別，衍生自和類別。Controls developers extend this class to create data-bound controls that work with classes that implement the interface and classes that derive from the and classes. 衍生的類別時類別，覆寫方法來擷取資料繫結控制項的使用者介面項目方法。When deriving a class from the class, override the method to bind the user-interface elements of your control to data retrieved by the method. 在大部分情況下，方法是您將會覆寫衍生類別中的唯一方法。In most cases, the method is the only method you will override in your derived class. ASP.NET 2.0 的資料繫結控制項，方法相當於方法，並將資料繫結在執行階段呼叫。For ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound controls, the method is the equivalent of the method, and is called to bind data at run time. 方法呼叫和方法。The method calls the and methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自類別來建立自訂的資料繫結控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the class to create a custom data-bound control. `GeneologyTree`控制呈現`pre`擷取從相關聯的資料來源控制項的 HTML 文字 樹狀結構的資料區段。The `GeneologyTree` control renders a `pre` HTML section with a text tree for the data retrieved from an associated data source control. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`GeneologyTree`控制項，在上一個範例中，定義，並將它繫結控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `GeneologyTree` control, defined in the previous example, and bind it to an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/rootviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/rootviewvb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例存取的 geneology.xml 檔案包含下列資料。The geneology.xml file accessed in the code example contains the following data. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法擷取物件相關聯的資料來源控制項，藉由呼叫方法。The method retrieves a object from the associated data source control by calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法呼叫以擷取從相關聯的資料來源控制項的物件以及如何呼叫方法來擷取資料。The following code example demonstrates how the method is called to retrieve the object from the associated data source control and how the method is called to retrieve the data. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: Called when one of the base data source identification properties is changed, to re-bind the data-bound control to its data.

span.span: Called when one of the base data source identification properties is changed, to re-bind the data-bound control to its data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，會呼叫或變更頁面之後隨時事件。The method is called when the or is changed any time after the page's event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在資料繫結控制項可以呼叫方法如果在初始化資料繫結控制項之後，變更此屬性會識別資料來源。The following code example demonstrates how a data-bound control can call the method if a property that identifies a data source is changed after the data-bound control is initialized. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性`true`在其中的 HTTP 要求是回傳，已啟用檢視狀態，但是資料繫結控制項具有尚未已繫結的情況下。The sets the property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound. 此案例中是常見的控制項例如和位置在執行階段變更控制項的可見性。This scenario is common with controls such as and where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法，而不是方法衍生的資料繫結控制項時類別。Implement this method instead of the method when you derive a data-bound control from the class. 放置在控制項的資料繫結邏輯保留和順序錯誤所引發的事件。Placing your control's data-binding logic in keeps the and events from being raised in the wrong order. 雖然基底類別會提供任何特定的實作，此方法，方法由呼叫方法所擷取的資料繫結的任何使用者介面控制項值方法。While the base class provides no specific implementation for this method, the method is called by the method to bind the values of any user interface controls to the data that is retrieved by the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作從衍生類別中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class derived from . `GeneologyTree`逐一查看控制項和從及其相關聯的物件擷取，並建立的資料繫結至文字的樹狀。The `GeneologyTree` control iterates through the and objects retrieved from its associated , and creates a text tree structure for the data it is bound to. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#4)]

summary.span: Retrieves data from the associated data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法時之後擷取資料時，將資料繫結至資料繫結控制項的項目。The method is called, after data is retrieved, to bind data to elements of the data-bound control. 衍生的類型覆寫此方法的預設實作不是適當時才擷取資料。Derived types override this method to retrieve data only if the default implementation is not adequate.
